DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect vortioxetine ( 10 20 mg , daily ) versus paroxetine ( 20 mg , daily ) sexual function healthy participant 5 week double-blind treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Vortioxetine , Paroxetine , Placebo Sexual Functioning Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: The drug test study call vortioxetine . This study look effect treatment sexual functioning healthy participant . The study enroll approximately 352 participant . Participants randomly assign ( chance , like flip coin ) one four treatment groups—which remain undisclosed patient study doctor study ( unless urgent medical need ) : - Vortioxetine 10 mg - Vortioxetine 20 mg - Paroxetine 20 mg - Placebo ( dummy inactive pill ) - capsule look like study drug active ingredient All participants ask take one tablet/capsule , daily , orally 5 week . This multicenter trial conduct United States . The overall time participate study approximately 7 week . Participants contact telephone 2 week last dose study drug follow-up assessment .

Has hypogonadism free testosterone value outside normal range Screening Visit indicative hypogonadism . 12 .
